class.name: MasterServerResponse
class.brief_description: Response from a [method MasterServerClient.create_game] or [method MasterServerClient.update_game] call.
class.description: Response from a [method MasterServerClient.create_game] or [method MasterServerClient.update_game] call. Await on [signal finished] signal to get the [MasterServerResult].

signal.name: finished
signal.description: Signal emitted when the request is finished.
